trans-unit.source: Represents a disk extent that contains log data.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un extent del disco che contiene i dati del log.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by LogExtent instances.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>istanza memorizza i relativi dati in una raccolta di extent del disco, rappresentati da istanze LogExtent.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>

trans-unit.source: A particular LogExtent is associated with exactly one <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>, and LogExtent objects in the same <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> are of identical size.
trans-unit.target: Un particolare LogExtent Ã¨ associata a uno <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>e gli oggetti LogExtent nello stesso <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>sono di dimensione identica.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> </xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>

trans-unit.source: Space is added to and removed from a <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> instance in extent increments.
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio viene aggiunto e rimosso da un <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>istanza incrementi di extent.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>

trans-unit.source: Although LogExtent objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files.
trans-unit.target: Anche se gli oggetti LogExtent siano rappresentati su disco come file, non dovrebbe non spostati o eliminati come file normali.

trans-unit.source: To delete a LogExtent instance, remove it from the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection> that contains it.
trans-unit.target: Per eliminare un'istanza di LogExtent, rimuoverlo dal <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection>che contiene.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified path of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il percorso completo di questo <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent> objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent>oggetti siano rappresentati su disco come file, non devono essere spostati o eliminati come file normali.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent>

trans-unit.source: To delete a <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent> instance, remove it from the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection> that contains it.
trans-unit.target: Per eliminare un' <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent>istanza, rimuovere il messaggio <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection>che contiene.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection> </xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent>

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso completo di questo <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le dimensioni di questa <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> istanza, in byte.

trans-unit.source: The size of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni di questa <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> istanza, in byte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato di questo <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The state of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato di questo <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> istanza.
